game.name: FragPunk
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support
game.shortDescription: 프래크펑크는 짜릿한 5대5 히어로 슈팅 게임으로, 샤드 카드를 통해 전투의 규칙을 깨고 매 라운드마다 색다른 경험을 제공합니다. 여러분의 기술을 마음껏 발휘할 준비를 하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: FragPunk is a thrilling 5v5 hero shooter where Shard Cards allow you to break the rules of combat and ensure that no two rounds are ever the same. Get ready to unleash your skills!

reviewHighlights.text: I think is a great game but honestly, there is a lot of AI if they just could pay artist to do the art of the game it would be a lot better than now....
Could we please stop doing updates just to do updates and instead try and make the game relevant again. Literally 800 ppl online right now. If we coul...
